casebody.data:
NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Petitioner, v. ATLANTA METALLIC CASKET COMPANY, Respondent. No. 12640. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. April 14, 1949. Rehearing Denied May 30,1949. David P. Findling, Associate Gen. Counsel, NLRB, A. Norman Somers, Asst. Gen. Counsel, NLRB, and Rose Mary Filipowicz, A-tty., NLRB, all of Washington, D. C., for petitioner. M. E. Kilpatrick, of Atlanta, Ga., for ap-pellee.

Before HOLMES, McCORD, and WALLER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

It is ordered that the petition of the Board for enforcement of its order be, and the same hereby is, denied.
